snippet: Rt. Rev. Justin Welby is taking over an Anglican church that is divided on the issue of same-sex marriage, an issue that the British Parliament will consider this week.
abstract: Justin Welby formally becomes 105th archbishop of Canterbury; says he shares Church of England's opposition to marriage between people of same sex, issue British Parliament will soon consider.
lead_paragraph: Rt. Rev. Justin Welby is taking over an Anglican church that is divided on the issue of same-sex marriage, an issue that the British Parliament will consider this week.

headline.seo: New Archbishop of Canterbury Takes Over Church of England
headline.main: New Archbishop of Canterbury Takes Office
headline.print_headline:
Britain: The New Archbishop
Of Canterbury Is Confirmed

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
